column5: My place is 3 minutes from Katy mills mall,Typhoon texas water park, I-10 and Grand parkway/99 tollway, energy corridor. 34 minutes from NRG stadium ,Toyota center, Minute maid park, George Brown convention center, downtown, 36 minutes to the zoo and museum district,48 minutes to Bush and Hobby airport.
